Package entity

Class LivingEntity

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.LivingEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Monster, NPC, Player
public class LivingEntity extends Entity
The LivingEntity class represents a living entity in the game with various attributes such as health, armor, strength, and magic.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a LivingEntity with the specified attributes.

      Constructs a LivingEntity with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the entity.
      weight - The weight of the entity.
      health - The health of the entity.
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the entity.
      armor - The armor of the entity.
      maxArmor - The maximum armor of the entity.
      strength - The strength of the entity.
      maxStrength - The maximum strength of the entity.
      magic - The magic of the entity.
      maxMagic - The maximum magic of the entity.
      inventory - The inventory of the entity.
      type - The type of the entity.
      entityManager - The entity manager for managing the entity.
      level - The level of the entity.
      experience - The experience of the entity.
      spriteManager - The sprite manager for the entity.
